markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Rat Snake Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1315)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A solitary snake might be no cause for alarm, but a hissing mass of frenzied snakes can make even seasoned adventurers shudder. Rat snakes can reach lengths of up to 10 feet, and they gather en masse to hibernate as well as to breed. Though nonvenomous, these territorial snakes will strike anything that threatens them.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/SnakeSwarm.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Rat Snake Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1315)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 249</row>

**Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=239) mind

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 3, piercing 5, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 3, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 3

**Mass Wriggle**<actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The rat snake swarm takes damage from a melee Strike; **Effect** Snakes slither up and around the creature's weapon and limbs. The target must succeed at a DC 15 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet

**Swarming Strikes** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 1d8 piercing damage (DC 17 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-93" />
name: Rat Snake Swarm
